text: Ruud Vormer (born 11 May 1988) is a Dutch footballer who currently plays in the Belgian Jupiler Pro League for Club Brugge. ==Career== He started his career with AZ and joined Feyenoord on a free transfer in the summer transfer period of 2012.Ruud Vormer wordt Feyenoorder He joined Club Brugge on 1 September 2014 on a three-year deal.Ruud Vormer tekent 3-jarig contract bij Club Brugge He won the Belgian Golden Shoe in 2018.
